name: Rainbow Escape
description:
Can you escape before mom notices you're gone? Or... can you escape at all? Test your wits in this flash-game style point and click puzzler. 

This game was designed and made in 5 days for the Spring 2023 S&T Game Jam. This is by far the most art I've ever had to make for a game, which is why I went for the MSPaint 'style' to save time. My original plan for this game was way overambitious, and even included a secret ending that I wasn't able to add. But I think the result is still a very full-featured jam project!
